columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the virtual network

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a virtual network uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: enable_ddos_protection
columns.description: Indicates if DDoS protection is enabled for all the protected resources in the virtual network

columns.name: enable_vm_protection
columns.description: Indicates if VM protection is enabled for all the subnets in the virtual network

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the virtual network resource

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resourceGuid property of the Virtual Network resource

columns.name: address_prefixes
columns.description: A list of address blocks reserved for this virtual network in CIDR notation

columns.name: network_peerings
columns.description: A list of peerings in a Virtual Network

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: A list of subnets in a Virtual Network
